I've been as high as LE and as low as Silver 4. I've played throughout multiple regions (NA, EU, SEA, UAE) and probably have 3k hours combined between this account and all the smurfs I've had over the years. That being said, this game fucking sucks and I can't stop playing it. Source 2 when? Office is best map NA.
